caption: Several foxes were digging frantically. Three excavators were also digging on a small hill. The excavators worked from day to night. The foxes rested underground. Meanwhile, a little boy was having his meal. A group of people had dug a large pit in this area. While the fox family was digging underground, they encountered the mole family. They began a conversation with each other. A fox was patting the dirt wall, and then everyone started digging under his guidance. In the end, they dug into a shed full of chickens. Meanwhile, a group of people was partying around a bonfire. A group of animals dug into a room full of birds.

global.question: Do more than 5 people appear in the video?
Does it happen during day or night?
Are there more then three different backgrounds appearing in the video?
When does it happens in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?
